issue_comments.author: dagar
issue_comments.body:
@LorenzMeier @DonLakeFlyer ready for review please

Current @unit usage

```
  4  * @unit 1/s
  1  * @unit A
  1  * @unit bit/s
 44  * @unit boolean
 40  * @unit deg
  4  * @unit deg * 1e7
 19  * @unit deg/s
 54  * @unit enum
  1  * @unit Gauss
  1  * @unit Gauss/s
  1  * @unit hPa
  5  * @unit Hz
  1  * @unit kg
  3  * @unit kg*m^2
 47  * @unit m
  1  * @unit m^2
  1  * @unit mA
  1  * @unit min
  1  * @unit m/m
 12  * @unit ms
  1  * @unit m-s
 35  * @unit m/s
  2  * @unit (m/s)-s
 10  * @unit m/s/s
  1  * @unit (m/s/s)-s
  1  * @unit rad
  8  * @unit rad/s
 26  * @unit s
  7  * @unit SD
 66  * @unit us
  3  * @unit V
  1  * @unit W
```

issue_comments.author: DonLakeFlyer
issue_comments.body: I'd probably change the seconds ones to secs, msecs, usecs. A little more clear. What is SD?

issue_comments.author: dagar
issue_comments.body:
It's in ekf2 so I left it alone. Standard deviation?
https://github.com/PX4/Firmware/blob/cecec86081566f243a0dec33b9dedc3dd1624f58/src/modules/ekf2/ekf2_params.c#L316

issue_comments.author: dagar
issue_comments.body: I used s, ms, us to stick to SI, but if you want the abbreviation I'll change them.
